titleStmt.title: Articles of enquiry given by [his Right Reverend Father in God James Lord Bishop of Wort.] and delivered to the church- wardens, and side-men, to be considered and answered in his visitation, holden in the year of our Lord God.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Diocese of Worcester. Bishop (1675-1683 : Fleetwood)
Fleetwood, James, 1603-1683.

notesStmt.note: "His Right Reverend Father in God James Lord Bishop of Wort" written on t.p. in manuscript form.
Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
